articles.title: Apple Settles Siri Privacy Lawsuit: Are You Eligible for a Payment?
articles.content:
Apple on Tuesday agreed to a $95 million cash settlement in response to a class action lawsuit accusing the company of violating user privacy by retaining recordings of unintended Siri sessions. 
Th… [+3013 chars]
articles.summary: Apple settled a class action lawsuit for $95 million over user privacy violations related to Siri recordings. Users may be eligible for a payment as a result of the settlement.
key_takeaways: Apple settled a lawsuit for $95 million over Siri privacy violations.
Users impacted by the violation may be entitled to a payment.
The settlement highlights concerns over user privacy and data protection.
significant_quotes: Apple agreed to a $95 million cash settlement in response to a class action lawsuit accusing the company of violating user privacy by retaining recordings of unintended Siri sessions.
